enhanced_by.reason: Both methods handle the processing and addition of values to the Option, making processValue a suitable setup method.
clearValues can be used to reset the state of the Option before adding new values, ensuring a clean state for testing.
acceptsArg should be invoked before addValue to ensure the Option can accept more arguments, preventing runtime exceptions.
requiresArg can be used to verify if the Option requires more arguments, which is relevant for testing the behavior of addValue.
